title: Terry crews is father of the year
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SOjp6qPZU5E&t=150s

He built is OWN PC, and did it to bond with his son that loves gaming so much as well

http://i.imgur.com/DaUvKRX.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/bvySuGt.jpg
specs are

Two Titan X's
~~Intel Core i7 6700k~~   (actucally its an extreme version of intel, which is the 1k CPU) 
Water cooling
and forgot the rest, all others are mentioned on this video 


Its good to know there are many 20s-50 year olds are being a part of the gaming community, after all gaming is not only for kids, its for everyone as long as you enjoy it

LOOK AT THAT, he has an old spice deodorant inside his PC
